name: Legend of sus: Bruh of the wild
name_original: Legend of sus: Bruh of the wild
description:
Legend of sus: Bruh of the wild     legend of sus: bruh of the wild is a bad remake of legend of zelda breath of the wild. There are no objectives; just explore!!          CONTROLS: WASD = MOVE SHIFT= SPRINT SPACE=JUMP MOUSE=LOOK RIGHT CLICK= ZOOM I used some assets from the unity asset store to make this. WARNING: MAY TAKE A LONG TIME TO LOAD!!

for the best experience, play in fullscreen with sound on.

by r5t44games
